ygData.subject: Re: Unicron's Minions
ygData.msgSnippet: Blacknightmare: Blacknightmare did it and and watched with a enigmatic smile ... given.  Once he was finished, he looked around for more.  The Sweep commander

Blacknightmare:

Blacknightmare did it and and watched with a enigmatic smile



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Malice/ Splattercannon:
>  
> Hellplague smiled as Malice soon devoured the energon cube he was 
given.  Once he was finished, he looked around for more.  The Sweep 
commander chuckled and got off the bed.
> "There is more, come and feed."
> She helped him to his feet.  He swayed from side to side a moment, 
and Hellplague steadied him.  They walked out the doorway and over 
to Slattercannon, who waited in vehicle mode, laden with energon.  
Malice saw it, and transformed into his beast mode.  The skeletal 
undead T- Rex stalked toward the ship and started chomping down on 
the cubes.
> "Quite an eater, I see," Splattercannon commented.
> Hellplague walked back into the room to get Blacknightmare.
> "Come see this.  It's our pet, demonstrating how he will smash the 
Maximals!"
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> 
> BlackNightmare took some energon and eat a part and offer more to 
> Malice and Hellplague.
> 
> "Eat"invited the femme"We need it"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague/ Malice:
> >  
> > The two bots loaded with energon eventually made it back to the 
> holding chamber.  Splattercannon landed outside the room and 
> Hellplague walked into the room.  She handed a cube of energon to 
> Blacknightmare and set two on the bed.  She sat on the bed and 
tried 
> to awake Malice.
> >  
> > Malice slowly stirred, his systems slowy coming back online.  
His 
> optics slowly lit, returning to the red they were usually.  His 
> sight wasn't one hundred percent though, things were still 
blurry.  
> He set up, took a deep breath, let it out, then turned to 
Hellplague.
> > "I know you... don't I?" he asked.
> > Hellplague scooted close to Malice and put her arms around his 
> shoulders.  She embraced him, then let go to get an energon cube.  
> SHe handed him th cube before speaking:
> > "Feed and be well, our pet.  Welcome home, Hunter Killer, the 
> newest of the Minions."
> > For a moment, Malice simply stared at her, then grinned, the 
> chuckled, then drank of the energon cube. 
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Blacknightmare:
> > 
> > The feme didn't say anything and she remain togehter Malice
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague:
> > >  
> > > "We'll there in a half hour, cause Splattercannon will have to 
> > take it easy with all the energon he's carrying.  Let me know if 
> > something happens to Malice.  We drop everything and get to you, 
> > just in case." the Sweep commander said as she and 
Splattercannon 
> > wound their way to the room.
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNightmare:
> > > 
> > > "Sleeping"said the femme"But I guess that he would like to 
take 
> > his 
> > > dinner soon"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Malice/ Hellplague:
> > > >  
> > > > Malice nodded, and soon fell asleep again.  But this time 
his 
> > > power system would continue to power up, and his systems 
> continue 
> > to 
> > > recover.
> > > >  
> > > > Hellplague finished loading Splattercannon with energon 
> cubes.  
> > > The gunship lifted from the floor, and leaned from side to 
side, 
> > > trying to adjust the added weight.  He went ahead of her and 
the 
> > > Sweep commander grabbed a few cubes before leaving herself.
> > > > "Alright Blacknightmare, we're on our way.  How's Malice?"
> > > 
> > >
